programme.desc: The team unearths the secrets of a Cotswolds field. Roman coins and bits of masonry have been found on this land, but it's the discovery of a piece of mosaic floor that has the archaeologists excited.

programme.title: Thomas Cromwell: A Very Modern Tudor
programme.desc: Historian Tracy Borman investigates to the rise of Thomas Cromwell from the son of a Putney blacksmith to Henry VIII's right hand man.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: This season kicks off with an investigation into the last battle to have taken place on British soil: the battle of Culloden in 1746, on the outskirts of the capital of the Highlands, Inverness.

programme.title: London: 2000 Years of History
programme.desc: Doctor Suzannah Lipscomb is granted access to view artefacts from Henry VIII's pleasure palace. Dan Jones tells the story of Dick Whittington and discovers what 14th-century skeletons reveal about the Black Death.

programme.title: France: The Postwar Recovery
programme.desc: In France, D-Day brought hope. But as the nation began to rebuild, the dream of a brighter future soon clashed with the harsh reality of post-war life.

programme.title: Europe's Secret Armies
programme.desc: After the German invasion of 1940, the Norwegian government fled to London, leaving the country in the hands of the collaborator Quisling. But there were many willing people to fight back.

programme.title: Nazi Collaborators
programme.desc: The IRA never shared fascist ideology, but it hated the British and the apparently peaceful methods of the de Valera government in the Irish Republic.

programme.title: The War Files
programme.desc: From murder on the streets of Warsaw to the liberation of Europe, this lucid and engaging series provides a dramatic account of a conflict that engulfed the free world.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries of WWII
programme.desc: The Japanese raid on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941, shocked the world and drew the USA into the war. Did British Intelligence and Britain's Prime Minister Winston Churchill know in advance of the Japanese attack?

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team unearths the secrets of a Cotswolds field. Roman coins and bits of masonry have been found on this land, but it's the discovery of a piece of mosaic floor that has the archaeologists excited.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: A country estate ravaged by revolution; a haunted hospital in a Japanese forest; and a tranquil island said to have inspired a musical legend. Each haunted shell ready to tell its own story.

programme.title: The 100 Days
programme.desc: Pivotal historical events unfold over 100 days, revealing origins, consequences, and lesser-known incidents surrounding major occurrences that shaped the modern world.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: A look at how Hitler and the Nazi party rose to power in Germany during the 1930s. It is a powerful portrait of the greed, manipulation and frightening underestimation of Hitler's ambition.

programme.title: 48 Hours to Victory
programme.desc: The evacuation of Dunkirk and its impact on the outcome of World War II.

programme.title: Lost Women Spies
programme.desc: In 2000, boxes containing top-secret files were found in a garden shed in Cornwall. They detailed the lives and codenames of Britain's first female agents sent to the frontline during the war.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: A battle between two alien robot clans, the Autobots and the Decepticons, is reignited on Earth, with a teenage boy being the only one who holds the power to stop it.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: When college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers, he must accept his destiny and join Optimus Prime and Bumblebee in their epic battle.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: An event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: An experiment with dinosaurs created from DNA becomes a disaster when sabotage sets the prehistoric monsters loose in an island theme park.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote island's prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: A small team embark on a dangerous task, searching through a deserted island inhabited by ferocious dinosaurs.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: A spy is on a mission to disprove false accusations made against him by the very government organisation that he works for.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: A secret agent is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called Chimera.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: The lead-footed crew reunites in this turbo-fuelled tale of the vengeful brother of an international terrorist who sets his bloody sights on the boy racers that took his sibling down.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: When a woman seduces Dom into the world of crime, the crew face trials that will test them like never before.

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Humans come to realise that their new war against the Autobots could end with their own extinction when a threat more powerful than anything they have ever imagined presents itself.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. It's now up to an unlikely alliance.

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a Symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego 'Venom' to save his life.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer Cletus Kasady, who discovers Eddie's secret and becomes the host for Carnage.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham and unveils his alter-ego: Batman, a masked crusader who uses his strength, intellect, and high-tech deceptions to fight the sinister forces that threaten the city.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: A rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker thrusts Gotham into anarchy and forces Batman closer to crossing the fine line between hero and vigilante.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been years since Batman vanished into the night, turning from hero to fugitive. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar, and the emergence of masked terrorist, Bane.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis: the three-headed King Ghidorah.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Fearsome monsters Godzilla and King Kong square off in an epic battle for the ages, while humanity looks to wipe out both of the creatures and take back the planet once and for all.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: A young Peter Parker/Spider-Man begins to navigate his new-found identity as the web-slinging superhero.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
programme.desc: When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Biochemist Dr Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organisation's name.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating a highly skilled international rogue organisation that is committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment, Ethan chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the wrong hands. The IMF team must stop the fallout.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: The untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, better known as sworn enemies, but who once were friends bonded like brothers.

programme.title: Spider-Man

programme.title: Spider-Man 2

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: The web-spinning superhero must battle his own demons and a barrage of new villains including Sandman and Venom.

programme.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
programme.desc: A new kid in town who is picked on by bullies learns karate and eastern philosophy from Mr Miyagi, and learns how to fight back.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: Daniel, now a karate champ, goes to Okinawa with Mr Miyagi, his mentor. Miyagi rekindles an old flame while Daniel finds love, and enemies, of his own.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part III
programme.desc: A bad guy from the original Karate Kid plots revenge on young Daniel and his mentor Miyagi after they defeat his karate school and ruin his business.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: The untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, better known as sworn enemies, but who once were friends bonded like brothers.

programme.title: Bumblebee

programme.title: Transformers

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: After a disastrous parachute drop, Rambo is left stranded in the jungles with only his combat knife and bow and arrows to protect him.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: A Special Operations veteran is now into peace, serenity and non-violence. But when Trautman is held by the Soviets and interrogated, the CIA can do nothing and Rambo must come to his aid.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Archaeologists awaken an Egyptian priest mummified alive 36 centuries ago for killing Pharaoh Seti and sleeping with his mistress. When he escapes from the tomb, he becomes a threat to the world.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The re-resurrected mummy of an Egyptian high priest kidnaps the son of archaeologists who first dug him up, and sets out to destroy mankind by commanding the army of the ancient Scorpion King.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Rick O'Connell returns to combat a long-entombed emperor who threatens to plunge the world into his merciless service, with the chase going from Shanghai to high into the Himalayas.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Archaeologists awaken an Egyptian priest mummified alive 36 centuries ago for killing Pharaoh Seti and sleeping with his mistress. When he escapes from the tomb, he becomes a threat to the world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Forced into slavery by the corrupt heir to the throne, Roman general Maximus becomes a gladiator. His prowess in the arena leads him to Rome, the Colosseum, and a showdown with the new emperor.

programme.title: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in the jungle when a tough bounty hunter is sent deep into the Amazon to bring back his boss' son - a job that's not gonna be as easy!

programme.title: Charlie's Angels (2019)
programme.desc: In this next generation, the world's most highly trained women all over the globe are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Rick O'Connell returns to combat a long-entombed emperor who threatens to plunge the world into his merciless service, with the chase going from Shanghai to high into the Himalayas.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Blade - half-mortal, half-immortal - fights vampires who crave his special blood type for their plan to exterminate the human race.

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: This is the original story of the man who became Dracula, a young prince whose people were threatened by a warlord and who protected them the only way he could: by becoming a monster.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: A disgraced cop infiltrates the Miami street racing scene with an ex-con to redeem himself by bringing down a drug lord.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
programme.desc: When a mysterious virus turns people into mindless, flesh-eating zombies, a handful of survivors wage a desperate, last-stand battle to stay alive and human.

programme.title: Venom: Let There Be Carnage
programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer Cletus Kasady, who discovers Eddie's secret and becomes the host for Carnage.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After a radioactive spider bite, a nerdy teen develops keen senses and amazing strength.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: This high-octane action-thriller sees two men go back to the streets where it all began as they blast their way across Los Angeles and through the Mexican desert.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A military cop becomes involved in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when five people are randomly murdered by a sniper.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Hobbs has been tracking an organisation of lethally skilled drivers. The only way to stop the criminal mercenaries from stealing a top-secret weapon is to outmatch them at street level.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: In the vibrant, sleek 1980s, Wonder Woman will have to muster all her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: Cybertron has fallen. When Optimus Prime sends Bumblebee to protect Earth, he begins his journey to become the hero the universe needs.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: For the love of a beautiful woman a city will burn to the ground. An epic tale of honour, war, forbidden passion and the towering Trojan Horse.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: Survivors of Michael Myer's first rampage decide to take matters into their own hands, forming a vigilante mob that sets out to hunt Michael down, once and for all.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that curses those who enter it with a violent death.

programme.title: Land of the Dead
programme.desc: Packed with more heart-pounding and blood-curdling thrills than any theatre could show, this special unleashes the ultimate vision of George A Romero's latest living-dead shock-fest.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Man's greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When a teenage rebel is sent to Japan to live with his father, he is hooked on the treacherous world of street racing.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Abby Collins, a former Marine who is now a happily married housewife, soon discovers she will need to put her skills to use when her past comes to haunt her.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain and the Man in Black share an ancient vendetta: they must fight to the death in an epic battle over the fate of the universe.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: FBI agent Flynn has to transport a witness, but as the plane reaches 30,000 feet, hundreds of deadly snakes are released, causing violent mayhem.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: A system of satellites designed to protect the earth from natural disasters starts to malfunction, but who is responsible and can it be stopped?

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on a naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: In this futuristic action, it's been 25 years since a wall was built around Scotland to halt the Reaper virus. Now, London's in danger and a cure must be found while up north anarchy is rife.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Miami cops, Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey, have 72 hours to find $100 million worth of heroin that was stolen from the basement of police headquarters.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In a future where extreme sports have grown into TV reality bloodlust, a speedway champion is ordered by a ruthless warden to suit up and drive - or never see his little girl again.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters' leader.

programme.title: Skyscraper

programme.title: Greatest Days
programme.desc: A feature adaption of "The Band" musical, featuring songs of Take That.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.

programme.title: The Last Journey
programme.desc: Sweden. Swedish TV duo Filip and Fredrik travel to France to reignite the passion for life in Filip's father.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: A soldier searches for his missing wife, infiltrating a facility he believes is tied to trafficking, only to find it's a futuristic park blurring reality and illusion.

programme.title: The Beast Within
programme.desc: After witnessing her father undergo a terrible transformation, a 10-year-old girl becomes ensnared by the dark ancestral secret that her parents have so desperately tried to conceal.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: A group of friends plays spin the bottle in a house marked by a massacre, unleashing an evil spirit. As they die in terrifying ways, the survivors must uncover the house's dark secrets.

programme.title: AfrAId
programme.desc: The Curtis family tests a new digital assistant, AIA, which learns their behaviours and anticipates needs. But AIA's protective nature means nothing, or no one, will interfere with them.

programme.title: Germanwings: What Happened On Flight 952
programme.desc: In 2015, Germanwings Flight 9525 crashes in the French Alps, killing 150 passengers and crew members. A decade later, survivors, experts and journalists have their say.

programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating boy meets two Santas in the woods, one of whom claims to have fallen from his sleigh, but he is more interested in the other man when he learns he is on the run for robbing a bank.

programme.title: Watchmen: Chapter I
programme.desc: In an alternate world, the murder of a government sponsored superhero draws his outlawed colleagues out of retirement, into a mystery that threatens their lives and the world itself.

programme.title: Maria
programme.desc: Famed opera singer Maria Callas retreats to Paris in the 1970s after a glamorous yet tumultuous life in the public eye.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin, a Milwaukee real estate agent, gets a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime. Thrust into a world of hitmen and betrayal, he must face his dark past and a vengeful crime lord brother.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: D'artagnan
programme.desc: France. D'Artagnan arrives in Paris trying to find his attackers after being left for dead, which leads him to a real war where the future of France is at stake.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails face Shadow, a powerful new foe. Outmatched, they form an unexpected alliance to stop him and protect the planet.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A young boy who, in writing his yearly note to Santa, mixes up the letters and sends it to Satan instead.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: In Oz, two clashing witches, Elphaba and Glinda, form an unlikely friendship. Elphaba, wrongly labeled wicked, seeks to expose the corrupt Wizard ruling the land.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her son's science teacher.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: A down-and-out stuntman must find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster film.

programme.title: Mack & Rita
programme.desc: Wakes up after being struck by lightning in a sound bath regression pod to find she has magically transformed into her 70-year-old self.

programme.title: Summer Camp
programme.desc: Follows three friends who used to spend every summer at a sleep away camp together. After years, when the opportunity to get back together for a summer camp reunion presents itself, they all seize it.

programme.title: It Ends with Us
programme.desc: Lily overcomes a traumatic childhood to embark on a new life. A meeting with a neurosurgeon sparks a connection but Lily begins to see sides of him that remind her of her parents' relationship.

programme.desc: Former heroes face threats. The Comedian is dead, Dr. Manhattan exiled to Mars, Ozymandias survived an attack and Rorschach is arrested.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
